instructions: ### This is the official "Das Schwarze Auge 5." (The Dark Eye 5th) Roll20 character sheet by Ulisses Spiele Aventuria awaits, as TDE 5 is also available on Roll20. The system includes relevant mechanisms to play in the wonderous world of Aventuria and The Dark Eye and create your own adventures, characters and stories. The character sheet includes TDE compendium integration and allows you to add your advantages, disadvantages, cultures, professions, special skill, spells, liturgies, rituals and equipment as you see fit. See README for more details. ### Compendium Integration This sheet provides integration for The Dark Eye Compendium ### TSA Character Sheet Migration You can seamlessly exchange the character sheet with the TSA character sheet. Make sure to create a backup of your world in advance. ### Guide and Tutorials The creation of a small Wiki is in progress. In the meantime users can find some Videos in VTToms and Hitdice's Youtube channel in German. ### Feedback and Issues If there is a problem with the character sheet or any compendium books, please check the issue section [Issues](https://github.com/Plushtoast/TDE-Roll20-Official/issues) and open a new issue for us with as much detail as possible. If you want to discuss TDE for roll20 or need some assistance you can also join the Discord Servers: * [Ulisses Spiele GmbH](https://discord.gg/WXu4m8sc)

useroptions.description: Effekt von Zaubern und Liturgien bei der Probe im Chat anzeigen.
Effekte von Sonderfertigkeiten mit Stufe multiplizieren.
Aktiviere die erweiterte Talentprobe mit Modifikatoren für FW, QS und Teilproben für 3W20 Proben.
